languages.text: "Мон-кай, назови причину, по которой ты здесь. Надеюсь, она достаточно весома, чтобы я не приказал немедленно отправить тебя навстречу твоим предкам".

traits.locale_text: "Мон-кай, назови причину, по которой ты здесь. Надеюсь, она достаточно весома, чтобы я не приказал немедленно отправить тебя навстречу твоим предкам".

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай, назови причину, по которой ты здесь. Надеюсь, она достаточно весома, чтобы я не приказал немедленно отправить тебя навстречу твоим предкам".

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else I will you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."
"Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else I will you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."
"Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else I will you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."
"Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

languages.text: “说清你的来意，猴子。我希望你的话足以说服我，否则我会立刻送你去见你的祖先。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

traits.locale_text: “说清你的来意，猴子。我希望你的话足以说服我，否则我会立刻送你去见你的祖先。”

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、来訪の理由を述べよ。納得に足るものでなければ、お前を先祖と同じ場所に即刻送ってやろう」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、来訪の理由を述べよ。納得に足るものでなければ、お前を先祖と同じ場所に即刻送ってやろう」

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey, nennt den Grund Eures Kommens. Hoffentlich ist er überzeugend, sonst lasse ich Euch unverzüglich zu Euren Ahnen schicken."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

traits.locale_text: "Chem-Pan-Sey, nennt den Grund Eures Kommens. Hoffentlich ist er überzeugend, denn sonst lasse ich Euch unverzüglich zu Euren Ahnen schicken."

languages.text: « Mon-keigh, expliquez ce que vous venez faire ici et tâchez de fournir une raison convaincante. Autrement, vous irez rejoindre vos ancêtres sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

traits.locale_text: « Mon-keigh, expliquez ce que vous venez faire ici et tâchez de fournir une raison convaincante. Autrement, je vous enverrai rejoindre vos ancêtres sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: «Mon-keigh, anuncia el motivo de tu presencia aquí. Espero que sea convincente, pues, de no serlo, conocerás a tus ancestros en los próximos instantes».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

traits.locale_text: «Mon-keigh, anuncia el motivo de tu presencia aquí. Espero que sea convincente, pues, de no serlo, conocerás a tus ancestros en los próximos instantes».

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, geliş sebebini belirt. Umarım tatmin edici bir sebebin vardır. Yoksa hiç vakit kaybetmeden atalarının yanına gönderilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh, state the reason for your coming. I hope it is convincing, or else you will be sent to meet your ancestors without delay."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh, geliş sebebini belirt. Umarım tatmin edici bir sebebin vardır. Yoksa hiç vakit kaybetmeden atalarının yanına gönderilirsin."
